model.text:
Medical Questionnaire

Please provide complete and honest responses in the questionnaire. Accurate information is crucial for understanding your medical history and providing personalized care.

Thank you for your cooperation!

model.error: This field must contain a valid e-mail address.

title.text: Are you taking any medications on a regular or occasional basis?

columns.title: How often on a daily basis?

title.text: Are you allergic to any medications?
Please write medications you are allergic to:
Are you allergic to any food or anything else?
Please write on what are you allergic and what kind of reaction you had (rash, itching, strangling, heart failure, shock and similar)
How much are you smoking on daily basis?
